クリィミーマミ ソングスペシャル2 カーテンコール

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: music
tag.description: Music anime generally revolves around people concerned with music in their everyday lives. In addition they often adhere to certain genre conventions, the emphasis on training and practice in preparation for competitions, characters desire for self improvement, and pursuit of a specific goal. This is not unlike the Sports category.

tag.name: the arts
tag.description: The arts represent an outlet of human expression, usually influenced by culture, and driven by human creative impulse. Major constituents of the arts include literature – including poetry, novels and short stories, and epics; performing arts – among them music, dance, and theatre; culinary arts such as baking, chocolatiering, and winemaking; media arts like photography and film, and visual arts – including drawing, painting, and sculpting. Some art forms combine a visual element with performance (e.g. film) and the written word (e.g. comics). From prehistoric cave paintings to modern day films, art serves as a vessel for storytelling and conveying mankind`s relationship with its environment. Source: Wiki

character.name: Nega
character.description: One of the two cats from the Feather Star asked to watch over Morisawa Yuu while she has magical powers. His name is short for negative.

character.name: Posi
character.description: One of the two cats from the Feather Star asked to watch over Morisawa Yuu while she has magical powers. Her name is short for positive.

character.name: Creamy Mami
character.description: Creamy Mami is http://anidb.net/ch16534 [Yuu]`s appearance as a 16-year old girl under which she becomes an idol.

character.name: Ootomo Toshio
character.description: Friend of Morisawa Yuu and Kisaragi Midori, he falls in love with Creamy Mami after her first TV appearance. He doesn`t know that she is actually a transformed Yuu, who in turn has a love interest in him.

character.name: Kisaragi Midori
character.description: Ootomo Toshio`s best friend, Midori is in love with MorisawaYuu and seeks to tell her this. Because of his bashfulness, he needs Toshio`s help to do this.

character.name: Morisawa Tetsuo
character.description: Husband of Natsume, father of Yuu, Tetsuo works in Creamy with his wife. He used to be a member of Natsume`s motorcycle gang.

character.name: Morisawa Natsume
character.description: Wife of Tetsuo, mother of Yuu, Natsume works in Creamy with her husband. She used to be the leader of a motorcycle gang. Her and her husband own Creamy Crepe making crepes.

character.name: Morisawa Yuu
character.description: A normal 10-year old girl, Yuu harbours a secret crush for her childhood friend Ootomo Toshio. Given the ability to transform into a 16-year old girl, she is made to fill in for the absent Ayase Megumi to sing on TV. Giving her name as Creamy Mami, she becomes an overnight hit.

character.name: Tachibana Shingo
character.description: President of Parthenon Productions, he quickly recognises Creamy Mami as future sensation, and tries to make her into a star.

character.name: Ayase Megumi
character.description: A popular idol and the star act of Parthenon Productions, she feels threatened by the newcomer, Creamy Mami, and declares herself to be Mami`s rival.
